title: Microsoft announces glut of new data centers but says it won’t let your electricity bill go up
description: The tech giant has pledged to be a "good neighbor" as it continues to invest in AI infrastructure throughout the country.
content: The tech giant has pledged to be a "good neighbor" as it continues to invest in AI infrastructure throughout the country.
